Color Picker: Your Ultimate Tool for Color Selection and Management
Unlock your creativity with Color Picker, the Chrome extension designed for designers, developers, and anyone who loves working with colors! Whether you’re designing a website, creating digital art, or simply exploring color palettes, our extension offers a seamless experience to enhance your workflow.

Key Features:
1. Effortless Color Selection: Quickly choose any color from your screen with our intuitive color picker tool. Just click and select, and watch as Color Picker instantly captures the color you desire.
2. Flexible Color Formats: Save your selected colors in both HEX and RGB formats. No matter your project requirements, you’ll have the perfect color values at your fingertips.
3. History Management: Never lose track of your favorite colors again! Color Picker keeps a comprehensive history of your recently selected colors, allowing you to revisit and reuse them with ease.

Why Choose Color Picker?
• User-Friendly Interface: Our extension is designed with simplicity in mind. Enjoy a clean, easy-to-navigate interface that makes color selection a breeze.
• Perfect for Professionals and Hobbyists Alike: Whether you’re a seasoned graphic designer or a casual user, Color Picker is tailored to meet your needs.
• Boost Your Productivity: Save time and streamline your design process by having all your color tools in one convenient place.

How to Get Started:
1. Install the Color Picker extension from the Chrome Web Store.
2. Click on the extension icon in your toolbar.
3. Select any color from your screen.
4. Save your colors in HEX or RGB format and access your history anytime!

Perfect for:
• Web Designers
• Graphic Artists
• UI/UX Developers
• Digital Creatives
• Anyone looking to explore the world of color!
